AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: beast tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided at a very young age that [PAWN_pronoun] would tame the most dangerous beast [PAWN_pronoun] could come across. When finally presented a chance at achieving this ambitious goal... things didn't quite work out how [PAWN_pronoun] imagined they would. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to settle with teaching the family pet a few new tricks instead.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ranch hand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s homeland was home to many ranches, and [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at one of them. While the animals found there didn't seem particularly intelligent, they had a knack for finding holes in their pens. [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days chasing escaped livestock, and mending broken fences.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bug collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had quite the exquisite collection of bugs, many from [PAWN_possessive] local region, and some from further afield. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to catch them all, an admittedly nigh impossible task to achieve, but that never stopped [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to some highly skilled cooks. While [PAWN_pronoun] learnt quite a few things, [PAWN_nameDef] didn't make it very far, as [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't like plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant shipwright
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to the local shipwrights. [PAWN_nameDef] knew all the commonly used tools by heart, and eventually started handing them to the shipwrights before [PAWN_pronoun] was even asked to fetch it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to a rather skilled blacksmith. Admittedly, [PAWN_nameDef] spent a substantial amount of time bandaging wounds, as [PAWN_nameDef] didn't quite seem to understand touching hot things was a bad idea.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embassy assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was dragged to one of the many local embassies by [PAWN_pronoun] parents, so it was only natural that [PAWN_pronoun] wound up as an assistant. Most days were spent organising scrolls and wardening guests, though occasionally something exciting happened.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: temple assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at the local temple. This usually involved sweeping the floor, and ensuring candles were in good condition. But sometimes [PAWN_nameDef] would be tasked with organising the library, or leading guests around.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: merchants assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted one of the many local merchants. Days were spent hauling crates of various goods around, repairing said crates when [PAWN_pronoun] dropped them, and occasionally working the counter.
